comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
The photo of  William Badger in the Baldwin "Red Devil" was taken in 1911 at Mineola, Long Island , also known as the Garden City Aviation Field. This is the same field Glenn Curtiss made his flights in July 1909 .The field in 1909 was called the  Washington Avenue Field.
Badger killed at Chicago International Aviation Meet  August 15, 1911
US Pilot # 36 July 30,1911
Walden Hangar in photo is Dr. Henry Walden

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Early Aviation:  Thanks for providing us with more information here.  We'll include the more precise location and date next time we update.

comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content: William Badger   Aero Club of America Pilot # 36   July 30, 1911   Mineola Aviation Field
